titles.title: A Little While, Our Lord Shall Come

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: "A little while!"- our Lord shall come, And we shall wander here no more; He’ll take us to our Father’s home, Where He for us has gone before, To dwell with Him, to see His face, And sing the glories of His grace.

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: "A little while!"- come, Savior, come! For Thee Thy bride has tarried long; Take Thy poor wearied pilgrims home, To sing the new eternal song, To see Thy glory and to be In everything conformed to Thee!
